script.name: Lib.Cmd.Trade.Buy
script.description: Lib Cmd: Ship buys ware for the best price in the universe, optional jump drive

line.comment: * SUCCESS: Returns array 0 amount 1 price per ware
* Ship searches for a station with given parameters.
* Ship will use autojump configuration, fly to station
* Ship will attempt to buy set amount of ware
* Script only returns cargo code if not enough cargo bay to hold 1
* Otherwise, will just buy as much as it can
* Script returns if not enough money
* One buy only
* Defaults to security sector checking
* Respect FQR limit: Will only purchase amount equal to total cargobay minus FQR
* If Refuel is set to true, and ship doesn't have enough energy to jump
* ship will attempt to purchase energy at nearest station it can jump to
* Starting with this, because hopefuly the ship can use its jumpdrive
* if $RespectFRQCargoLimit
* end
* Mayhem
* Mayhem: Added the $Station-> exists condition
* StationShouldBeFoundByNow
* We don't need to preload fuel if we're using safest route, ie no jumping
* Checking money again after refueling

sval.val: Lib Cmd: Ship buys ware for the best price in the universe, optional jump drive
buy ware
Buying %s
Amount to buy
Respect FRQ cargo limit
Max jumps
SUCCESS: Returns array 0 amount 1 price per ware
Ship searches for a station with given parameters.
Ship will use autojump configuration, fly to station
Ship will attempt to buy set amount of ware
Script only returns cargo code if not enough cargo bay to hold 1
Otherwise, will just buy as much as it can
Script returns if not enough money
One buy only
Defaults to security sector checking
Respect FQR limit: Will only purchase amount equal to total cargobay minus FQR
If Refuel is set to true, and ship doesn't have enough energy to jump
ship will attempt to purchase energy at nearest station it can jump to
Starting with this, because hopefuly the ship can use its jumpdrive
if $RespectFRQCargoLimit
Mayhem: Added the $Station-> exists condition
We don't need to preload fuel if we're using safest route, ie no jumping
Checking money again after refueling
